summary: THE CAR AS I WOULD DESCRIBE IT STALLS RANDOMLY WHILE DRIVING UNDER 40 MPH, THE ENGINE DOESN'T SHUT OFF BUT I LOSE DRIVE POWER AND THE RPM SHOOT UP.  THE DEALERSHIP HAS NOT BEEN ABLE TO REPRODUCE THE ISSUE AND NO ENGINE LIGHTS COME ON WHEN THE PROBLEM HAPPENS. I FEAR THIS WILL END UP CAUSING ME TO GET REAR ENDED.
